metadata.title: CVE-2019-11706 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw in Thunderbird's implementation of iCal causes a type confusion inicaltimezone_get_vtimezone_properties when processing certain emailmessages, resulting in a crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird <60.7.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
